entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
